settings.text: Free UK Mainland Delivery

settings.title: Game Over
settings.text: At Game Over, we’re bringing comfy back. We aim to be the leader in high-quality, innovative gaming products and are always working on brand new products that push the boundaries of what being comfortable means. Our focus is on quality and comfort, and all our products are thoughtfully designed for gamers, by gamers.

settings.title: Subscribe & save
settings.text: Be the first to know about our biggest and best sales and keep up with the latest Game Over news and updates.

settings.title: It's time to
settings.subtitle: Gaming bean bag
settings.text: Game Over is the leader in console seating. Providing pure, unrivalled comfort, our bean bag chairs are created for gamers, by gamers and are designed to give you everything you need to take your gaming to the next level.

settings.subtitle: Why choose us?
settings.title: Explain your brand philosophy
settings.text: Use this section to explain your company philosophy or standards. Showcase lifestyle photography for added emphasis. This content will appear on all products.

settings.title: Testimonials

settings.subtitle: Improved
settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.subtitle: Improved
settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.subtitle: built with your needs in mind
settings.title: Durable Pockets
settings.text: Stay in the zone: from your controller collection to that all-important snack supply, the two-tone pockets included on every chair can hold it all. They’re deep, sturdy, and the perfect solution to keep your essentials right where they need to be.

settings.subtitle: ready for anything
settings.title: Water Resistant Fabric
settings.text: Each chair is made from high quality, water resistant fabric and double stitched for longetivy. This means it repels any spills and is easy to wipe clean so you can play your way without getting distracted.

settings.subtitle: Keep essentials safe
settings.title: Headphone Hook
settings.text: Never loose your gaming headphones again - with a handy hook incoroparted into the design, your headphones are in arms reach and will always have a home. The dedicated fastening hook keeps them off the floor and safe from any accidents.

settings.subtitle: practical comfort
settings.title: Air Vents
settings.text: Every chair contains metal vents which allow for airflow. This creates an ergonomic seat that moulds to the shape of your body, contributing to a natural upright position that provides stability and support - no matter how long you’re playing for.

settings.subtitle: Gaming Bean Bag
settings.title: FAQs
settings.a1: Yes, all items (bean bag chair, lounger, foot stool and cushions) are made with water-resistant fabric. They are not fully waterproof, so avoid the open ocean.
settings.q2: What ages are your bean bags suitable for?
settings.a2: Our bean bags are suitable for all ages and all levels of gaming from casual gamers to pro competitors.
settings.q3: How do I clean the bean bags?
settings.a3: The bean bags are made with water-resistant fabric and are easily wiped clean with a damp cloth.
settings.q4: What are the bean bags filled with?
settings.a4: Game Over bean bags are filled with high quality, fire retardant EPS polystyrene beads that mould to your body.
settings.q5: Will I ever need to refill my bean bag?
settings.a5: Over time and through use, the bean filling will compress and a top up will be required. There’s a heavy duty zipper located at the bottom of each item for easy refills.
settings.q6: Do all bean bags come fully filled?
settings.a6: Due to shipping restrictions, the lounger does not come prefilled, but it does come with the filling and easy filling instructions. For our bean bag, international customers will need to fill the beanbag products themselves. Please note: the filling DOES come with the purchase of a bean bag! But you will need to insert the filling into the bean bag cover yourself. In a minority of cases, this will also apply to some UK orders.
settings.q7: How many packages does the bean bag arrive in?
settings.a7: For international deliveries, the bean bag filling & cover will arrive in two separate boxes, and lounger filling & cover will arrive in three separate boxes due to size.

settings.title:
UNLOCK THE NEXT LEVEL
OF COMFORT

settings.subtitle: Gaming Bean Bags
settings.title: Mix & Match!
settings.description: Find the finishing touches that will take your gaming experience to the next level. Choose from our nine permanent colourways and can create a set up unique to you.

settings.title: Durable Pockets
settings.text: Deep, sturdy, two-tone pockets are perfect for holding your controller or snacks

settings.title: Water Resistant Fabric
settings.text: High quality, water resistant fabric is easy to wipe-clean and double-stitched for longevity

settings.title: Headphone Hook
settings.text: Headphones can be stored safely off the floor with a dedicated fastening hook

settings.title: Air Vents
settings.text: Metal Vents allow for airflow, creating an ergonomic seat that moulds to the shape of your body

settings.title: Comfort and Support
settings.main_text: Filled with premium-grade EPS polystyrene fire-retardant beads for ergonomic comfort

settings.title: Fully Refillable
settings.main_text: An inner liner and heavy duty zip at the bottom of the bean bag allow for easy refills

settings.title: Made in the UK
settings.main_text: Designed and manufactured in the heart of the Midlands.

settings.subtitle: Unique & Sleek Shape
settings.title: design
settings.text: Say yes to that all day gaming session. With a laser focus on quality and comfort, we incorporate a streamlined, ergonomic design that conforms to your body shape, keeping it in its natural upright position and always providing stability and support.

settings.subtitle: For The Players
settings.title: design
settings.text: We’re bringing comfy back. We are always working on new products that push the boundaries of what being comfortable means, whether for endurance gaming or a movie marathon. All our products are thoughtfully designed for gamers, by gamers with a focus on quality and comfort. However you spend your downtime, spend it with Game Over:

settings.testimonial: “Great products, look super cool and superb quality. My boys love their new gameover bean bag. Highly recommended.”
settings.author: Abu Isa

settings.testimonial: “I can chill on this bean bag for hours, it's that comfy! Anyone who has been thinking about investing, I 100% recommend you do.”
settings.author: Ander

settings.testimonial: “This bean bag is super comfy, big and even has pockets on the side for your controller/snacks. The foot stool finishes off the look and set up nicely.”
settings.author: Chris

settings.question: The bean bag I want is sold out!
settings.answer: ﻿We consistently replenish our stock levels, so when a colourway is sold out due to high demand, it will be restocked within a couple days.

settings.question: Do you do custom prints for the cushions?
settings.answer: We do not currently do custom prints, but we have multiple special edition designs based on popular games.

settings.question: Are the items water-resistant?
settings.answer: Yes, all items (bean bag chair, lounger, foot stool and cushions) are made with water-resistant fabric. They are not fully waterproof, so avoid the open ocean.

settings.question: What ages are your bean bags suitable for?
settings.answer: Our bean bags are suitable for all ages and all levels of gaming from casual gamers to pro competitors.

settings.question: How do I clean the bean bags?
settings.answer: The bean bags are made with water-resistant fabric and are easily wiped clean with a damp cloth.

settings.question: What are the bean bags filled with?
settings.answer: Game Over bean bags are filled with high quality, fire retardant EPS polystyrene beads that mould to your body.

settings.question: Will I ever need to refill my bean bag?
settings.answer: Over time and through use, the bean filling will compress and a top up will be required. There’s a heavy duty zipper located at the bottom of each item for easy refills.

settings.question: Do all bean bags come fully filled?
settings.answer: Due to shipping restrictions, the lounger does not come prefilled, but it does come with the filling and easy filling instructions. For our bean bag, international customers will need to fill the beanbag products themselves. Please note: the filling DOES come with the purchase of a bean bag! But you will need to insert the filling into the bean bag cover yourself. In a minority of case, this will also apply to some UK orders.

settings.question: How many packages does the bean bag arrive in?
settings.answer: For international deliveries, the bean bag filling & cover will arrive in two separate boxes, and lounger filling & cover will arrive in three separate boxes due to size.

settings.question: What are the measurements of the bean bags?
settings.answer:
• Classic Bean Bag Chair: L83cm, W60cm, H83cm (approx.)
• 8-Bit Compact Bean Bag Chair:  L73cm, W49cm, H73cm (approx.)
• Lounger: L120cm, W60c5cm, H83cm (approx.)

• Cushion: L56cm x H27cm (approx.)
• Footstool: W60cm, H42cm, D40cm (approx.)

settings.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer: We aim to deliver within 3 - 5 working days. This is subject to change during high demand seasons like Christmas.

settings.question: I live outside of the U.K. Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer:
We ship to a selection of EU countries, and are currently expanding our shipping list to incorporate more!

At the moment, we ship our products to the following countries:

Austria

Spain

France

Netherlands

Denmark

Italy

Germany

Ireland

Belgium

Portugal

Sweden

Poland

settings.question: How much is shipping?
settings.answer: For ALL orders, we offer FREE SHIPPING with no minimum order.

settings.question: Why don't you ship to my country?
settings.answer: We are currently unable to ship to certain countries due to their shipping regulations. Our products and the boxes we ship in are very large, and in many cases too large for delivery to certain international countries.

settings.question: What is the return/exchange policy?
settings.answer: You can return items up to 30 days from purchase. Please email us at orders@loft25.co.uk to confirm instructions prior to sending.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
I need help with my order/tracking!
settings.answer: Please email us at orders@loft25.co.uk or check out our Contact page for more information.
